name: nuclear waste
description: A small pellet of silvery metal, still warm to the touch.

name: nuclear fuel pellet
description: A small pellet of fissile material.  Handle carefully.

name: hazardous waste drum
description: A yellow drum meant for the storage of hazardous substances.

name: nether organ
description: An alien organ of unknown purpose or function.

name: nether extract
description: A strange, pink substance that remains after dissolving alien matter.  Your hands pass through it like water, but it feels like gelatin.
